revised_title: Forecasting the Airborne Spread of Foot-and-Mouth Disease and Newcastle Disease: Methods and Predictions
tldr: This article discusses the methods used in the United Kingdom to predict the airborne spread of foot-and-mouth disease and Newcastle disease. It describes the importance of controlling these diseases and the potential routes of transmission. The article also explains the process of predicting airborne transmission, focusing on factors such as the quantity of virus released, virus survival, and the ability to cause infection. The methods currently used for predicting airborne transmission of these diseases are discussed, along with the challenges and limitations.
